1. Paradise Lost (1667) )
This classic film tells the story of Adam and Eve, who were sent from God in a perfect world. But when Eve decided to disobey God and taste the fruit of the tree of knowledge, she not only brought sin into the world but also lost her eternal life with God. This powerful film not only tells the timeless and profound story of Adam and Eve but also offers a thought-provoking and inspiring look at the nature of humanity, sin, redemption, and eternal life with God. You can mention this film's powerful message about the nature of humanity, sin, redemption, and eternal life with God to make it more interesting.

2. I Heart Huckabees (2013) )
This popular romantic comedy tells the story of a young single woman named Lily Tomlin who has been dating for a long time but has never found someone she really loves until one day she meets a charming and handsome man named Kevin Dunn who is also very busy with his work but still finds some time to spend with his friends and especially with Lily Tomlin and Kevin Dunn, who fall in love right away and become inseparable. This funny and heartwarming romantic comedy tells the story of two young people who fall in love right away and become inseparable.
